fields.name: ConsistencyMode
fields.description: Gets the consistency mode for the restore point. Please refer to https://aka.ms/RestorePoints for more details.

fields.name: ExcludeDisks
fields.description: List of disk resource ids that the customer wishes to exclude from the restore point. If no disks are specified, all disks will be included.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Gets the provisioning state of the restore point.

fields.name: SourceMetadata
fields.description: Gets the details of the VM captured at the time of the restore point creation.

fields.name: TimeCreated
fields.description: Gets the creation time of the restore point.
